body: Yes, i've changed my name into ChocolateWeed. Im just worried if it is innapropriate or not. kthxbye
body_tagged: Yes, i've changed my name into ChocolateWeed. Im just worried if it is innapropriate or not. kthxbye
title: Name?

replies.body: I don't see how it can offend anyone, weed is a plant. If someone can get offended by a plant well.. but it's the internet so. Someone will be offended
replies.body_tagged: I don't see how it can offend anyone, weed is a plant. If someone can get offended by a plant well.. but it's the internet so. Someone will be offended

replies.body: It doesn't offend me. When I see your name, I think of the weeds in my garden, killing my plants. It just matters how other users view your name and how they take it in.
replies.body_tagged: It doesn't offend me. When I see your name, I think of the weeds in my garden, killing my plants. It just matters how other users view your name and how they take it in.

reply_to.body: I appreciate the topic informing us all about this. Keep up the great work! pls
reply_to.body_tagged: I appreciate the topic informing us all about this. Keep up the great work! pls

replies.body:
Heeya ChocolateWeed,

Don't worry about your name, it's appropriate and the staff don't punish you for it :)

And all the people that posted useless comments, you don't have to comment/reply. He/she asked if his name is appropriate before going on the server and risking being punished and he/she has a right to do so. Rather ask before than being sorry afterwards.

replies.body: I absolutely see no way for someone to be offended by your name. Unless the person gets offended by chocolate or weed, nope
